title: Plz riot staff help.
body: I bought icons for the poro king before there was a deal about buy them all for 400 rp. i bouth 3 of them so i wasted rp that i could use to get to lvl 30 cause im 29 but i cant because i did that. is there any way u could give me back some rp?

replies.body: Do you have any rp refunds?

Well, Riot's stance is that's all you get in terms of getting rp back for things which you bought. I'm afraid there's not much to do about it, aside from being informed about future purchases.

You could send in a support ticket, but I doubt it.
